overview: Richard S. Warzala has served as a director of Allied Motion since August 2006 and currently serves as President and Chief Executive Officer. After consulting for the Company for six months, he joined Allied Motion as President and Chief Operating Officer in 2002. Prior to his employment with Allied Motion, Mr. Warzala held various management positions at American Precision Industries Inc., including president of its API Motion subsidiary prior to its acquisition by Danaher Corporation. Following the acquisition, Mr. Warzala continued as President of the Motion Components Group for Danaher Corporation.
